# Elixir of Tumbling
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** —

**Price** 250 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This draught of liquid grants the drinker the ability to tumble about, avoiding attacks and moving carefully across nearly any surface, granting a +10 competence bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks for 1 hour.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|cat’s grace]]*

**Cost** 125 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 512
